product_name: The North Face Impulse Active Quarter-Zip Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A light, technical top for cool-weather runs, The North Face Impulse Active Quarter-Zip Shirt uses breathable panels with FlashDry(TM) fibers that dry fast and regulate body temperature. A perfect mix of light warmth and high performance, polyester fabric offers 4-way stretch, wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly. FlashDry(TM) fibers in the panels down the center back, neck and under arms and sides dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Front zipper offers instant ventilation when you start to heat up. Raglan sleeves offer a comfortable, nonbinding fit; thumbholes keep sleeves in place and keep hands warm. Flatlock seams reduce chafing and increase durability. Hem is slightly longer in back than front, increasing coverage for active sports. Chest pocket stores small items. The North Face Impulse Active Quarter-Zip Shirt for men features reflective highlights to increase visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: A light, technical top for cool-weather runs, The North Face Impulse Active Quarter-Zip Shirt uses breathable panels with FlashDry(TM) fibers that dry fast and regulate body temperature.
